name: Banana Bread
longDescription: - low-poly knife model for the game. - There are two models low poly and high poly. name: Chocolate Cake
longDescription: Clean detailed mesh, fully quad based topology. Modeled in real world scale. Wrinkles are baked to normal map. Fully UV unwrapped non overlapping. Low-Poly. With 4K Color, Roughness and Normalmap in lossless PNG format. 100% PBR compatible. Works in any 3D software / game engine. Native Blender file has all scene, camera and render settings ready.
